heading: Quotations about places.
general-note: Here are entered collections of quotations about several places in various parts of the world. Collections of quotations about specific types of places or about individual places are entered under the appropriate heading with the subdivision. Quotations, maxims, etc.. e.g.. Cities and towns--Quotations, maxims, etc.; United States--Quotations, maxims, etc.. Collections of quotations from individual places are entered under. Quotations. or headings of the type Quotations, English, [French, etc.] with local subdivision..
